text: Hi, I am new here. looking for guidance on how to display HubSpot info in my platforms admin panel.

Hi if you’re meaning data pulled from a portal, you’ll want to use the apis. <https://developers.HubSpot.com/>

You’ll want to create a developer account, and then find the appropriate api endpoint for the specific types of information you wish to display <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/overview>

I also recommend if you need help with API’s to ask in <#C2YHAHB6K|api> there are some great friendly people there that often help out.
Have anyone included partials in other partials and encountered any problems? It seems to work, but I couldn't find in the documentation if it's supported.
I've never had an issue with it.
I want to post data to Leadspedia on HubSpot forms when click submit. but how can I do this ?
I have a new company start up that I want to develop and grow.
tracking is normally a generated number.
